racos_classification¶

This module contains the class RacosClassification, which provides a classifier for all Racos algorithms.

Author:
Yu-Ren Liu
class racos_classification.RacosClassification(dim, positive, negative, ub=1)[source]¶

This class implements a classifier used by all Racos algorithms.

__init__(dim, positive, negative, ub=1)[source]¶

Initialization

Parameters:
  • dim – a Dimension object
  • positive – positive population
  • negative – negative population
  • ub – uncertain bits, which is a parameter for Racos
mixed_classification()[source]¶

The process to train this classifier, which can handle mixed search space(continuous and discrete).

Returns:no return value
print_neg()[source]¶

Print negative population.

Returns:no return value
print_pos()[source]¶

Print positive population.

Returns:no return value
print_sample_region()[source]¶

Print sample region.

Returns:no return value
rand_sample()[source]¶

Random sample from self.__solution_space.get_dim().

Returns:sampled x
reset_classifier()[source]¶

Reset this classifier.

Returns:no return value
set_uncertain_bit(iset)[source]¶

Choose uncertain bits from iset.

Parameters:iset – index set
Returns:no return value
